titleStmt.title: Keepe within compasse: or, The worthy legacie of a wise father to his beloued sonne teaching him how to liue richly in this world, and eternally happy in the world to come. Meete for all sorts of people whatsoeuer.
titleStmt.author: Trundle, John, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Initialed John T.; possibly by John Trundle.
Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: Keepe within compasse: or A direction for a good life.
Imperfect; cropped, with loss of imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
